I hear "ingot because" :)

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Rj 
  To=
: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, October 09, 2009 8:38 PM
  Subje=
ct: Re: [EVP-ITC] Got this from spirit friends,


    I can't hear anything=
 in that .wav file.  It just immediately ends.


        --- On Fri, 10/9/0=
9, SnowfireL@... <SnowfireL@...> wrote:


          From: SnowfireL=
@... <SnowfireL@...>
          Subject: [EVP-ITC] Got this from spi=
rit friends, [1 Attachment]
          To: RTSC@yahoogroups.com, inside_the_=
box_rtsc_talk_radio@yahoogroups.com, EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
          Date=
: Friday, October 9, 2009, 5:49 PM


            

          Check this one=
 out, he says, "In God, We Trust"  how can anyone doubt that these are spir=
its?  I've heard my own mother speaking, my great Aunt Hazel Lilly with her=
 husband Ralph say their own names, using their own voices.  Why don't you =
folks believe them?  They are not from outer space, they are not radio frag=
ments, nor are they monsters and demons, these are people like us, that hav=
e left this physical world, to live in the world of spirit.  How can any of=
 you doubt when they are all around us? sf
